name: Docklands Executive Apartments

reviews.text: This accommodation was absolutely fantastic, I cannot speak highly enough of it. My family and I stayed for the weekend to do some Melbourne shopping. We are from the country and come down to the city every couple of months. Each time we try a new place to stay, and it is safe to say that this was by FAR the best value for money that we have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Best value for money in Melbourne!!!

reviews.text: 2 friends and I just had a short trip to Melbourne. The apartments are modern and clean and well located, a short stroll to southern cross station. Belinda was very helpful when we checked in, pointing out where all the local amenities were. We are going back next year and will definitely staying here again.
reviews.title: Great Apartment, Great Location.

reviews.text: This was the perfect place to stay for myself and friends for the week of the Melbourne cup. The apartment was lovely, and had everything we needed - even an iron and ironing board! The apartment location was perfect, close to town, the tram, train station, and heaps of restaurants close by. Paul and Belinda were very welcoming, with great tips for dining out and a bottle of wine to go with our meal! We would definitely recommend this for a great place to stay.
reviews.title: Melbourne cup week

reviews.text: We have stayed in Melbourne a lot over the past 30 years and I would have to say the apartment we had here was the best situated and laid out that we have come across.
reviews.title: Docklands is the best in Melbourne

reviews.text: Belinda and Paul were very, very helpful and could not do enough for us while we were there.
reviews.title: Perfect Docklands Apartment!!

reviews.text: We had 5 great nights and if we had to catch a taxi to the opposite end of town it was only $10AUD. A tram runs right past the front of the building and the trains are but a short 10min walk up the road.
reviews.title: Absolutely amazing apartment, so close to everything and exceptional service!

description: Docklands Executive Apartments is not a hotel, it is your home away from home with all the benefits of city living. We have personally selected a number of apartments in a residential building that are secure and fully self contained for your privacy. Each of these contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom apartments offer spacious open-plan living and dining rooms, floor to ceiling double glazed windows and a private balcony with river, bay or harbour views. Features include a Large TV, FREE Foxtel, DVD, Ipod dock.High Speed WiFi for up to 5 devices at $15 per day and also secure under cover parking at $10 per day.Included is a fully equipped kitchen with quality European cooking appliances, microwave, dishwasher, full size fridge. There is an iron and ironing board, hair dryer in each bathroom, washing machine and clothes dryer. Docklands Executive Apartments are situated between Collins and Bourke Streets, in the heart of Docklands next door to Etihad Stadium. It is one of Melbourne’s most prestigious inner suburbs on the edge of the old CBD. Docklands is home to some great entertainment, restaurants, shopping experiences including Harbour Town, South Wharf DFO and Spencer Street Fashion and the world famous 9 Elephants Thai restaurant. We are walking distance to the city centre, Etihad Stadium, Crown Casino, Melbourne Convention Centre and Southern Cross Station. There is a FREE Tram, the City Circle Tram which leaves every 10 minutes right outside your door. But the best is we provide you with a 24/7 personal host to make your stay as stress free as possible.
